name: refresh
effect: Removes a burn, paralysis, or poison from the user.
short_effect: Cleanses the user of a burn, paralysis, or poison.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.
flavor_text.platinum: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.
